modes.description: A collection of AI-powered tools for various purposes such as project management, content creation, and analysis.
A set of tools aimed at enhancing development workflows, including version control, coding environments, and collaborative coding platforms.
Access to community-driven platforms for discussions, social interaction, and networking.
Tools for collaborative design, creative content, and prototyping.
Access and manage email accounts and communication workflows.
Access to video streaming, sharing, and content creation tools.
ChatGPT for general conversation, idea generation, and knowledge-based queries.
Claude for advanced AI-driven interactions with specialized capabilities.
Google's Gemini AI for research, data analysis, and prediction modeling.
Poe AI, a conversational model optimized for creative applications.
Perplexity AI for deeper knowledge and specialized question-answering.
GitHub Copilot for coding assistance, suggestions, and debugging.
Hugging Face's conversational AI for natural language processing tasks.
AI for creative image generation based on text prompts.
Suno AI for specialized data analysis and forecasting.
Version control and collaborative software development platform.
Replit for online coding, IDE, and collaboration.
Platform for machine learning models, datasets, and tools for AI development.
Web-based version of Visual Studio Code for cloud development.
Social media platform for updates, discussion, and networking.
A community platform for discussion, collaboration, and real-time messaging.
Social news site for tech discussions and sharing of important industry updates.
Figma for collaborative design, prototyping, and user interface creation.
A platform for creatives to share and showcase their design work.
Google's email service for personal and professional communication.
Microsoft's Outlook for professional email and calendar management.
YouTube for video sharing, streaming, and educational content.
